title: Manage a Multiple Offer Situation
description: A seller has received three offers on their property simultaneously. The listing agent must organize them for review.

tasks.description: Acknowledge receipt of all offers to the respective buyers' agents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Confirmation emails are sent for all three offers.

tasks.description: Create a spreadsheet or summary sheet comparing the key terms of each offer (price, contingencies, closing date, financing).
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, side-by-side comparison of the offers is created.

tasks.description: Schedule a meeting with the seller to present the offer summary and advise on next steps (accept, counter, or ask for highest and best).
tasks.expected_outcome: A meeting is scheduled, and the seller is sent the summary sheet in advance.
